reqs:
BALINESE GAMELAN ENSEMBLE. For undergraduates (graduate students register in MUSC 565B 001).
OPEN TO NON-MUSIC STUDENTS: The gamelan is open to all without audition. Recommended option: Combine MUSC 165 with MUSC 428F (Music of Indonesia). The two can be taken separately, but will be run in a coordinated manner.
http://www.music.ubc.ca/index.php?id=2011
description: Training on traditional instruments and their techniques, with emphasis on ensemble performance. Different sections focus on the music of different cultures, e.g., Bali, China, Ghana, Korea. May be repeated for credit in accordance with program requirements for B.Mus. or B.A. in Music, or when permitted in other programs.
